metadata.name: Acid Snow
metadata.description:
This NFT is my vision of acid snow, this scary beauty, which has been made of real snow picture taken by myself. I also compose the sound.
All of my artworks are done in "Adobe Software Family" and also "Resolume Arena".

I was a dreamer in my childhood, from my mind to my vision. In darkness, I tried to see objects and even my parents’ faces in different ways so I could dream about it and make stories in my mind. I used to look at the ground and continue the footpath by widening and tightening my eyes. As child only I could see my vision, now with digital arts I can show you the way I prefer to see the world by playing with sounds and pictures. 
Visuals and sounds bring us an experience of a journey, in which every single of us can tell our own story. 
So, let’s enjoy it!
Use headset to have a better journey!
